title: Customer Sign Up and Login Success
description: Verify customers can sign up with valid details and log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-up page
Input valid customer details including username, email, and password
Submit the sign-up form
Check sign-up success message and redirection to login or dashboard
Navigate to login page
Input correct username/email and password
Click login button
Verify successful login and customer dashboard access

title: Invalid Sign Up Input Validation
description: Verify that sign-up form validates inputs and blocks invalid or malicious entries such as XSS scripts.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-up page
Input invalid data such as empty fields, invalid email format, and XSS script in username
Submit the form
Check for appropriate validation error messages and prevention of submission

title: Post Ad Wizard Normal Flow
description: Verify that customers can post ads through the 4-step wizard with valid inputs, including category selection, details, images, and preview.

steps.description: Login as a customer
Navigate to post ad wizard
Select valid category from the list
Enter ad details with valid INR budget and Indian location
Upload up to 8 supported images (JPG/PNG)
Review ad preview
Submit the ad
Verify ad is created successfully and appears in ad listing

title: Post Ad Wizard Input Validations and Limits
description: Check all form fields validate inputs correctly including maximum image upload limit, character limits, and proper currency formatting.

steps.description: Start post ad wizard as customer
Select category
Enter invalid budget values (e.g., negative number, non-numeric, more than allowed max)
Display input validation error for budget
Try uploading 9 images
Prevent upload with message about max 8 images limit
Input script tags or special characters in description fields
Show sanitization warning and prevent submission

title: Ad Listing Filters and Pagination
description: Verify customer can browse ads with filters by category, location, and search, and that ads display correct information with localization.

steps.description: Navigate to ad listing page
Apply filter by category
Show only ads matching that category
Apply filter by Indian city location
Ads update to only those in selected location
Perform search with keywords
Ads update with relevant matches
Check INR price formatting with ₹ symbol and lakhs/crores notation where applicable
Scroll through more ads to check pagination or infinite scroll
Additional ads load correctly with loading skeleton

title: AI Vendor Matching Strict Category Enforcement
description: Verify that AI vendor matching engine only recommends vendors with exact ad category match and ranks them correctly by location, keywords, rating, and experience.

steps.description: Navigate to ad detail page with a specific ad category
Verify AI recommended vendors all strictly match the ad category
Verify top vendors are ranked by location proximity, keyword relevance, rating, experience, and verified status

title: Vendor Quote Submission and Auto Reject Logic
description: Verify that vendors can submit quotes with price_inr, delivery_days, and message; customers can accept/reject quotes; and accepting a quote automatically rejects competing quotes and closes the ad.

steps.description: Vendor logs in and navigates to matched ad detail
Submits quote with valid price_inr, delivery_days, and message
Quote is listed under ad with correct details and status pending
Customer views quotes and accepts one quote
Accepted quote is marked accepted and ad is closed
All competing pending quotes are automatically rejected

title: Vendor Profile Display Accuracy
description: Verify that vendor profiles correctly display avatar, business info, star ratings, review counts, experience years, specialties, location, portfolio, and stats.

steps.description: Navigate to vendor profile page
All profile sections including avatar, business info, star ratings, review count, years of experience, specialties, location, portfolio images, and quote stats are displayed accurately

title: Review and Rating System End-to-End
description: Verify that customers can leave reviews and star ratings post-completion of accepted quotes and that vendor ratings update automatically.

steps.description: Customer logs in and navigates to completed quote of a vendor
Leaves a review and selects a star rating (1-5)
Submits the review
Review is saved and visible on vendor profile
Vendor's aggregated star rating recalculates accordingly

title: Real-Time Notification Bell Functionality
description: Verify real-time notifications for new quotes, accepted quotes, and messages update unread count badge correctly, and clicking notifications navigates to correct context.

steps.description: Login as customer or vendor
Trigger new quote, accepted quote, and new message events
Notification bell shows updated unread count badge
Click a notification
Navigate to corresponding quote, message thread, or accepted quote section

title: Thread-Based Messaging System Integrity
description: Verify messaging system supports threaded conversations between customers and vendors linked to ads and quotes, displaying history with timestamps accurately.

steps.description: Open message thread linked to an ad or quote
Message history is visible with timestamps
Send new message in thread
Message appears correctly and participants receive notifications

title: Admin User Management Functions
description: Verify admin can view, search, and filter all users by role; access user details including verified status and vendor ratings.

steps.description: Admin logs into admin dashboard
Navigate to user management page
Filter users by customer, vendor, and admin roles
User list updates accordingly
Search for a specific user
Correct user details shown including verification and ratings

title: Admin Ad Moderation Controls
description: Verify admins can search, filter all ads by status, view complete details, and delete ads with confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to admin ad moderation page
Apply filters by ad status (active, closed, flagged)
Ads list updates accordingly
View an ad's full details including owner, timestamps, location, and budget in INR
Delete an ad and confirm deletion
Ad is removed and confirmation message displayed

title: Admin Message and Flag Management
description: Verify that admin can view read-only customer-vendor conversation threads, see participant counts, and moderate flagged content showing reasons and navigation.

steps.description: Access admin messages page and open conversation thread
Conversation details and participants visible, but no edits allowed
Access admin flag management page
Flagged items with reasons and timestamps are listed
Navigate to flagged ad/message/response from flag item
Moderation controls accessible

title: PWA Offline Mode and Installation
description: Verify full Progressive Web App capabilities including offline support, caching, custom install prompts on iOS and Android, and app icon display.

steps.description: Access the platform via supported browsers
Trigger app install prompt on supported iOS and Android devices
Verify install prompt shows correct custom instructions
Install the app and launch from home screen
Operate the app with internet disconnected
Verify offline mode with cached assets and data works correctly without errors

title: UI Theme and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify black + neon cyan + electric purple theme is applied consistently across UI with glassmorphic elements, and that all UI components meet WCAG AA including keyboard navigation and ARIA labels.

steps.description: Load various UI components such as buttons, cards, headers, dialogs
Color scheme and neon glow applied as per design specification
Navigate the UI using keyboard only
All focusable elements are accessible with visible cyan outline
All ARIA labels are present and descriptive for screen readers
Test UI on mobile devices with minimum 44px touch targets

title: Localization of Currency and Location Data
description: Verify Indian-specific INR currency formatting with ₹ symbol and lakhs/crores notation, and Indian city selection system is correctly applied throughout the UI.

steps.description: Check pricing display in ads, quotes, budgets in various UI locations
Prices display with ₹ symbol and correct formatting (e.g., 1,00,000 displayed as 1 lakh)
Open location selectors in post ad wizard and filters
Location dropdown shows 40+ cities categorized correctly by major/other/international

title: Loading Skeletons and Error Boundaries
description: Verify skeleton loaders appear during data fetch operations and error boundary pages appear with user-friendly messages on failures.

steps.description: Open pages with asynchronous data such as ad listing, vendor profiles, admin dashboard
Skeleton loaders display during data loading
Simulate backend failure or network disconnect during data fetch
Error boundary page or component shows helpful error message with reload option

title: Rate Limiting and Security on Input Forms
description: Verify input forms enforce rate limiting on submissions, protect against XSS, and sanitize inputs across ads, quotes, and messages.

steps.description: Rapidly submit multiple forms (ads, quotes, messages) to trigger rate limiting
Block excessive submissions and show appropriate error
Submit inputs containing XSS attack vectors
Inputs are sanitized and scripts do not execute

title: Responsive Design Across Devices
description: Verify platform UI is mobile-first and renders correctly across breakpoints: mobile (375px), tablet (768px), desktop (1440px+). Touch optimized on mobile.

steps.description: Open platform pages on devices or emulator at 375px width
UI elements are usable, readable, and touch targets are minimum 44px
Resize viewport to tablet width 768px and desktop 1440px
UI adjusts layouts appropriately with no broken elements or overlapping
